item.title: Python ML: Teaching a robot NIM
item.description: By playing against itself repeatedly and learning from experience, eventually our AI will learn which actions to take and which actions to avoid when playing Nim. We do this through Q-learning, or assigning a reward value for every (state, action) pair. Weâ€™ll represent the game as an array (game board) of numbers (# of pieces in each row).
